Translations.Text: pokladeno na meni shcho ya ne kazhu pro BOHA krim pravdy. YA prybuvayu do vas z znakom z vashoho Lorda; dozvolʹte Dityam Izrayilya idutʹ
Vin skazav, "Yakshcho vy mayete znak, todi vyroblyayete tse, yakshcho vy ye pravdyvi
Vin kynuv vnyz yoho personal, ta tse povernulosya u velycheznoho zmiya
Vin vytyahuvav yoho ruku, ta bulo bilo do beholders
lidery sered Pharaoh lyudy skazaly, "Tse ne ye bilʹsh nizh rozumnyy charivnyk
Vin zakhoche vzyaty vas z vashoyi zemli; shcho vy rekomenduyete
Vony skazaly, "Respite yo ta yoho brat, ta posylayutʹ summoners do kozhnoho mista
Dozvolyayutʹ yim sklykayutʹ kozhnoho dosvidchenoho charivnyka
charivnyky prybuly Pharaoh ta skazaly, my pryyizhdzhayemo zaplacheni yakshcho my yavlyayemo soboyu peremozhtsiv
Vin skazav, "Tak diysno; vy navitʹ stanete blyzʹko do meni
Vony skazaly, "O Moses, abo vy kydayete, abo my kydayemo
Vin skazav, "Vy kydayete." Koly vony kynuly, vony tricked ochi lyudey, intimidated yim, ta vyroblene velyke zacharuvannya
My todi nadykhnuly Moses: "Kynʹte vnyz vash personal," whereupon tse kovtnuti shchob ni vony vyhotovyly
Otzhe, pravda perevazhala, ta yaki vony buly znyshcheni
Vony buly zavdani porazky todi ta tam; vony buly prynyzheni
